Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Requested sight by a user, includes gunsight and rocket sight for Swift F1 and Swift F7. For aiming the rockets, intended dive angle is 25-40 degrees. Use lower sight petals when low and slow (550kmh and within 400m), use the box for all other shots. There is a petal just below the gunsight for firing straight down in a top att...

A sight made for long range sniping. Theoretically suitable for all tanks, but preferably with a range finder. The top of the bottom line is about 400 m of APFSDS

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Simple gyroscopic collimator gunsight for the Swedish A32A and J32B jets. GUN ONLY at the moment, as it was all that was requested.

Install by unzipping included UserSkins folder to War Thunder root directory and combine with any existing folder.

#gachi_muchi

These are a couple sights I made, they have Nokotan from the anime My Deer Friend Nokotan.
They aren't perfect so if you have any ways to make them better, please let me know.
The first picture is sight_1.blk, and the second is sight_3.blk

Installation is pretty simple, you just extract the .zip file and put the .blk files into your UserSights folder.


This is the tutorial I watched: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNEBAcERHJ4
And this is the tool I used: https://turbowarp.org/718230823/fullscreen?fps=60&interpolate&clones=Infinity&offscreen&limitless&hqpen

Enjoy!

#anime #sight #eva02 #evangelion

"Angel" universal gunsight reticle.

Just meant to look cool and provide a good visual anchor without being too cluttered on the aim point.

Two versions included: with and without elevation lines.

The version without elevation lines is intended primarily for tanks with laser rangefinders and high velocity shells.
I personally find that the version with elevation lines is good for guessing elevation on very low velocity shells, I use that one on self propelled howitzers.

Let me know if you have any issues with it, keeping in mind that the ingame sight editor is still ext...

"Stadiamodern" universal gunsight reticle.

Tweaked and iterated over hundreds of hours of gameplay to make aiming as intuitive as possible.

Includes stadia lines with 2-milliradian hashmarks.This is handy if you end up on a very long range map in a tank with no rangefinder and are willing to do some quick math, but they're really there to help your brain adjust to diferent zoom levels across different tanks without having to make a conscious effort.

Intended primarily for tanks lacking a laser rangefinder.

If Gaijin ever adds support for different fonts and/or text size adjustment ...

#callofthenight #anime #alltanks #sight #ankouguisu
also if you want different image then il make it again!

Historically accurate General Motors XM-1 sight reticle.

The sight is very similar to earlier versions of US tanks with sights also made by Delco, but with the addition of a beam width indicator for the laser rangefinder at the center of the cross.

The small box(Reference square) top right was used for static testing of the reticle, when the test mode was activated, the reticle should be displaced so the center of the box would be where the center of the sight had been and the range would read 8888.

Hand made by me.
#xm1_gm #xm1 #historical
